questions.title: RFP Auctions
questions.content: Post RFPs publicly or invite vendors privately from a marketplace of vetted and reviewed partners. Accept bids or buy it now offers today.

questions.title: Contract Your Way
questions.content: Contract 100% on your terms - Light RFP removes vendors who attempt to negotiate post auction or fall below our service quality review threshholds.

questions.title: No Negotiation
questions.content: No pre-auction emailing or negotiating â€” coordinate services after the contract has been signed.

questions.title: No Fees For Posting
questions.content: Completely free to post contracts. Success fee of 5% charged to the winner of each contract.

questions.title: Win New Contracts Today
questions.content: Immediately bid on RFPs with a 5% success fee charged to the winner of each auction.

questions.title: Document Review
questions.content: Legal document review occurs pre-bid, eliminating legal delays due to redlines after winning the auction.

questions.title: Digital Signing
questions.content: Digitally sign documents immediately after winning an RFP.

questions.title: Seamless Onboarding
questions.content: Client coordination details, tax, insurance, and creditworthiness information is exchanged post auction.
